alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Colquitt; Grady; Mitchell; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 5:28PM EDT until August 06 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Thomas County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Brooks County in south central Georgia... Southern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pelham, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Thomasville, Pelham, Camilla, Cairo, Boston, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Riverside, Funston, Barwick, Sale City, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Grooverville, Capel, Dillon, Enon, Cotton and South Moultrie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
